inclusion.criterion: Males or females between the ages of 18 and 80 years undergoing primary coronary artery bypass graft surgery (CABG).
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients with and without a history of type 2 diabetes
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Patients with severely impaired renal function (serum creatinine ≥3.0 mg/dl or a glomerular filtration rate < 30 ml/min) or clinically significant hepatic failure.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Subjects with acute hyperglycemic crises such as diabetic ketoacidosis (DKA) and hyperosmolar hyperglycemic states.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Moribund patients and those at imminent risk of death (brain death or cardiac standstill).
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patients or next-to-kin with mental conditions rendering the subject or family member unable to understand the nature, scope, and possible consequences of the study.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Female subjects who are pregnant or breast-feeding at time of enrollment into the study.
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has a history of ESRD on HD and peritoneal dialysis, but no severely impaired renal function. Patient was treated with Vanco for an extended course of 6 weeks given her recurrent C diff.
